mapper.select: SELECT SPREADING_ID AS spreadingId ,USER_ID AS userId ,ROOM_ID AS roomId ,MONEY_AMOUNT AS moneyAmount ,USER_COUNT AS userCount ,USER_ID AS userId ,TOKEN AS token ,SPREADING_DTTM AS spreadingDttm ,REG_EMNO AS regEmno ,REG_DTTM AS regDttm ,MODI_EMNO AS modiEmno ,MODI_DTTM AS modiDttm FROM TB_MONEY_SPREADING WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_ID = #{roomId} AND TOKEN = #{token} AND SPREADING_DTTM >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL ${validationInterval} ${validationUnit})

SELECT SUM(T2.MONEY_AMOUNT) AS takenMoneyAmount FROM TB_MONEY_SPREADING T1 INNER JOIN TB_MONEY_SPREADING_RESULT T2 ON T1.SPREADING_ID = T2.SPREADING_ID WHERE T2.USER_ID != 0 AND T1.SPREADING_ID = #{spreadingId}
